title: Chlorine Residual Monitoring
description: An operator monitors the chlorine residual levels in the water distribution system to ensure disinfection is maintained.

tasks.description: Retrieve real-time chlorine residual readings from sensors throughout the network.
tasks.expected_outcome: System displays a map with live chlorine level data.

tasks.description: The system alerts the operator that the chlorine level in a specific zone is dropping below the minimum required level.
Dispatch a technician to the area to take a manual sample and flush the main if necessary.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a work order for a water quality technician.
